title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 1 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Ananta Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhīma Cekitāna Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Draupadī Droṇa Duryodhana Dāsa Ganga Govinda Hanumān Janārdana Karṇa Krsna Kuntī Kurukṣetra Kṛpa Madhusūdana Mantra Nakula Pārtha Rishi Sahadeva Sañjaya Subhadrā Sughoṣa Sātyaki Uttamaujā Varna Vasudeva Vikarṇa Vishnu Yudhāmanyu Yuyudhāna dasa Śaibya

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 2 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Droṇa Dāsa Ganga Govinda Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Pārtha Rishi Sañjaya Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa kṣatriya kṣatriyas yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 3 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Janārdana Keśava Krsna Kuntī Mantra Pārtha Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa karma yajña yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 4 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhārata Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu Vivasvān dasa yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 5 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa karma yoga yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 6 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa kuśa samādhi yoga yogī yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 7 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 8 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Brahmā Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Madhusūdana Mantra Pārtha Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vedāntists Vishnu adhibhūta adhiyajña adhyātma dasa karma kāra yoga yogī yogīs

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 9 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dhanañjaya Dharma Dāsa Ganga Indra Krsna Kuntī Mantra Rishi Sāma Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa vaiśyas

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 10 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Agni Airāvata Ananta Arjuna Aryamā Balarāma Bhakti Bhṛgu Brahmā Bṛhaspati Bṛhat Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Garuḍa Himālayas Indra Janārdana Krsna Kārttikeya Mantra Marīci Nāgas Nārada Prahlāda Rishi Rāma Sāma Varna Varuṇa Vasudeva Vishnu Vyāsa Vāsudeva Vāsuki Yakṣas dasa sāma Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 11 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahmā Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Droṇa Dāsa Ganga Janārdana Karṇa Krsna Mantra Rishi Sañjaya Sādhyas Varna Vasudeva Vishnu Viśvedevas Yakṣas Yādava dasa kumāras Ādityas Śiva

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 12 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu bhakti dasa yoga

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 13 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu dasa sūtra

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 14 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 15 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Balarāma Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 16 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Balarāma Bhakti Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 17 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Mantra Rishi Varna Vasudeva Vishnu dasa prasādam

title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 18 Sanskrit Terms (Verse Content Only)
text: Arjuna Balarāma Bhakti Bhāratas Brahman Chandra Dasa Devi Dharma Dāsa Ganga Krsna Kuntī Mantra Pārtha Rishi Sañjaya Varna Vasudeva Vedānta Vishnu Vyāsa dasa kṣatriyas sannyāsa tyāga vaiśyas yoga
